arts.sum: Watford found themselves behind against Portsmouth after just five minutes on Wednesday night, but goals from Imran Louza and Rocco Vata ultimately proved enough to claim a point at Fratton Park. Paul...

arts.ttl: Watford boss confirms Nestory Irankunda stance ahead of Oxford United tie after substitution outburst
arts.sum: A dugout seat and water bottle bared the brunt of Nestory Irankunda's midweek substitution anger, but the Watford boss isn't worried. The post Watford boss confirms Nestory Irankunda stance ahead of Oxford United tie after substitution outburst appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Watford vs Oxford predictions: Hornets to sting struggling U’s
arts.sum: Simon Barlow expects Watford to extend their recent unbeaten run when Oxford visit Vicarage Road in Saturday’s Championship clash.
